project_plan.name: Python-based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Develop a quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions, tracks their score, and displays the results at the end of the game. The questions and answers will be stored in variables within the code.

task.name: Define questions and answers variables for the quiz
Implement the quiz game logic to display questions and handle user input
Track the user's score throughout the quiz
Implement logic to display the final score at the end of the game
Write tests for each of the components of the quiz game
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
